title: BRIEF-Zenith Energy Sees Yearly Revenue Of About $5.5 Mln Generated From C-37 Well
text:
BRIEF-Zenith Energy Sees Yearly Revenue Of About $5.5 Mln Generated From C-37 Well

Stock Markets 53 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 02:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Zenith Energy Sees Yearly Revenue Of About $5.5 Mln Generated From C-37 Well Oct 9 (Reuters) - Zenith Energy Ltd : * C-37 PRODUCTION INCREASES * CONTINUED FLOW TESTING OF WELL C-37 IN JAFARLI OILFIELD RECORDED PRODUCTION RATE OF ABOUT 285 BARRELS OF OIL PER DAY * YEARLY REVENUE OF ABOUT $5.5 MILLION EXPECTED TO BE GENERATED FROM C-37 WELL * MOBILISATION OF 1,200HP DRILLING RIG TO C-30 WELL LOCATION IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE BEFORE END OF OCTOBER

BRIEF-Zenith Energy Sees Yearly Revenue Of About $5.5 Mln Generated From C-37 Well
